long_description: The Patagonia beanie is your go-to hat for everything winter-snowboarding, skiing, climbing and everyday cruising. Warm, moisture-wicking blend of nylon and wool is lightweight and stuffable. 2-layer construction offers an excellent fit and great durability. The Patagonia beanie has a polyester knit band liner that won't itch, and it wicks moisture away from your head.
short_description: The Patagonia beanie is your go-to hat for everything winter-snowboarding, skiing, climbing and everyday cruising.
